text:
Important study in 500,000 #COVID19 patients shows that the risk of rare #blood clotting is HIGHER for #COVID_19 than for #vaccines. https://t.co/VrMfoqpqma
Rates per million:
• 39 in #COVID patients
• 4 in #Pfizer/#Moderna #vaccine patients
• 5 in AZ-Oxford vaccine.
#NIH_CEAL https://t.co/mCwetw1W4e
